comments.author: seleme
comments.created_time: March 06, 2023, 09:48:19 PMLast edit: March 06, 2023, 10:03:59 PM by seleme
comments.body: Is this confirmed news by Freebitco.in? As an old member of Freebitcoin, I have made a nice profit back in 2019 but I doubt the new websites may offer the same amount of free claims on a monthly basis. What is main difference between Freebitcoin and other free faucet casinos for you? Ofc, many users miss those good old days P.S: Just checked the countdown, looks legit as usual, nothing wrong trying our luck again

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: Well there's nothing bad in starting with faucet being a beginner and this little amount given also help in preparation towards starting the real game when needed, there are many gambling sites that also operates their faucets but freebitco.in has been one of the one gamblers have enjoyed from the past because they are reliable and can be trusted unlike others that promise and fails, then coming back into this is another welcome to see many people having interest to learn from what they've got to offer them, it's was such a nice ride haven pass through the same process being a newbie then.

comments.author: STT
comments.body: More impressive thats its a regular thing but it has been the case Ive seen various lotteries have been operated to give out a grand prize such as a supercar or house.   That can be done sometimes as it has tax advantages and maybe its more profitable then selling the supercar or house to do so; I've definitely seen it done more then once.   The FBC draw for 200k or the car is either on the winners choice and usually they take the BTC payout as the car has delivery costs possibly.  The BTC payout gives interest immediately which is worth having so long as the winner is not suddenly at that moment very bearish on BTC prospects then maybe the car would make sense to take.  The interest paid would be about 0.35 BTC on top of the prize if retained annually, not enough yield to sway most people.  I have some tickets but would require extreme luck to actually take this, I hope anyway.

comments.author: Ebede
comments.body: I don't understand you I don't know if this is cause for celebration or it is something that you are you that freebitco platform we give up for any contest, I tried to understand you but I find it very difficult to understand exactly what you are saying other believe my everything to be normalised if we try to understand your point of discussion

comments.body: Quote from: SeeBiscuit on March 06, 2023, 11:29:26 PMQuote from: Ebede on March 06, 2023, 10:53:03 PMI don't understand you I don't know if this is cause for celebration or it is something that you are you that freebitco platform we give up for any contest, I tried to understand you but I find it very difficult to understand exactly what you are saying other believe my everything to be normalised if we try to understand your point of discussionNot much here to understand really. All I did was make a piece of art to celebrate freebitco's success in the space .I think there's a language barrier going on here, because I had a difficult time understanding what you are trying to say.I personally think that giving away 200,000 dollars at the frequency they give it out is truly an astonishing feat. Nothing else to that.Finally, I asked some questions to facilitate discussion, as I want to hear the opinions of other like-minded bitcoiners.For old-timers or old members of this forum then it is really that impossible that they wouldn't know about Freebitco and yes out of those early years even up to now on which they are really giving out that service whichgamblers do really love and this is why even upto these years where loyal users do really still engage with this platform.Im not sure on what are the changes when it comes into their faucet considering that they've been known for because of this faucet thing way back and then becomes bigger until it do expand out its business and offered others which they could possibly give out.When it comes to bonuses and promotions then they are the ones who do able to have that Lambo jackpot prize on their lottery.

comments.author: karmamiu
comments.body: One of the first sites that actually gave me real satoshis back then. I have tried several faucets and such, but almost all of them are not the real, while some actually gives you satoshis, it'll take a long time for you accumulate enough satoshis to withdraw.Back then I remembered, it was early 2017 that year when I won the pot money of the roulette, that was also the first time I have become a member of this forum. Although I have won only a couple of bucks around $10, it was sti helpful for me, coz it paved the way on my trading adventures. I made it my initial trading investment, and as far as I can remember that tiny bit of satoshi reached $500 after practicing trading with stratis and xrp. By the way I started my trading adventures on poloniex, cheers to those who knew that platform.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Initially, I thought the OP took the theme of art wrong when it was related to freebitcoin because afaik they don't serve bitcoin storage. I checked my account, and there was "Earn BTC" which I didn't realize since when.Users will follow the freebitcoin business transition and use as they serve. When I first came to claim sats every hour, slowly glanced at several betting options that were increasingly varied. To be honest I have gambled more on the site in the past and only used the faucet rewards.

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: Quote from: SeeBiscuit on March 06, 2023, 11:29:26 PMI personally think that giving away 200,000 dollars at the frequency they give it out is truly an astonishing feat. Nothing else to that.This is simply because the business is doing so well that they can give out these amounts and still generate profits. Freebitco.in has managed to generate an impressive turnover, with no KYC, no wagering requirements and attracting customers to the site with free satoshis from the faucet and promotions like this one.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: haven't felt any loss yet coz i do free bitcoin spins every hour its been a few years and then withdraw bitcoin from there playing dice rolls only once in a while and loss isn't that much if i think it's a waste of time so i decided to upgrade my account to premium membership holds some FUN and will be adding FUN every week because I believe putting money on this site is very safe because it has been established since 2013 so feel confident putting my money there in the form of FUN tokens while collecting some WOF, looks like This thread discusses lottery tickets for Lambo, I think will buy tickets for this event later have at least 1 lucky ticket

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Well, this is just another period of the Lambo draw which freebitco.in it has been held regularly for a long period, but I have not found, maybe I was looking badly, yet there has not been a single message about someone winning this. I myself have been there for quite a long period of time, but, however, I have not had both big wins and big losses.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: The Lambo draw will be in April as they are kinda like Linux Ubuntu versions which came out only in April and October,the same for the Lambo draw from Freebitco.in which taken into consideration the amount it costs at 200.000 dollars is a huge draw.I personally have more than 12 tickets for that draw but I am not at all enthusiast about it because the last guy that won it had over 4000 tickets collected,the good thing is that some body from the forum here won it and that is something special.I also know that even 1 ticket has equal chances to win the draw but seeing last rounds people with over 4000 tickets have won it.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Weren't the big promos by freebitcoin a regular thing? Idk since when, though since the times I visit it are rather apart by a huge margin. Back when I first got into crypto freebitcoin was the site that let me get my first Bitcoin and was also the one that introduced me to faucets. I thought it was a good way to earn, but considering how paltry it was and how impatient I am, I just used the amount I get to gamble on their site when I can back then lmao. Probably the only place where I gambled where I lost nothing really.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Freebitco.in is one of the first bitcoin faucet that is still running till date, i joined this platform in late 2015 when i first discovered bitcoin and was looking for ways to earn it for free since i had no money back then to buy, I am glad to say that i earned my first set of bitcoins through this platform, back in those days, they paid far more than what they pay now on hourly bases, though back then, bitcoin was pretty much cheaper than it currently is.ive never really used freebitco as a gambling platform aside buying lottery tickets from time to time, but in all the time i have participated in the lottery, i have never won, but i believe this is because i was never consistent.In all, Freebitco is a legendary bitcoin faucet and also a mini casino,.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Quote from: STT on March 06, 2023, 10:43:53 PMMore impressive thats its a regular thing but it has been the case Ive seen various lotteries have been operated to give out a grand prize such as a supercar or house.   That can be done sometimes as it has tax advantages and maybe its more profitable then selling the supercar or house to do so; I've definitely seen it done more then once.   The FBC draw for 200k or the car is either on the winners choice and usually they take the BTC payout as the car has delivery costs possibly.  The BTC payout gives interest immediately which is worth having so long as the winner is not suddenly at that moment very bearish on BTC prospects then maybe the car would make sense to take.  The interest paid would be about 0.35 BTC on top of the prize if retained annually, not enough yield to sway most people.  I have some tickets but would require extreme luck to actually take this, I hope anyway.The car is an attention grabber, a Bitcoiner having a Lambo in the neighborhood will really give an impression to the bad guys lurking around. With the crisis happening globally. It's going to keep people around nosy about how an individual riding a Lambo in 2023. I would be taking the BTC instead if I win. $200K is really huge for a giveaway and sure there will be a ton of users trying their luck for it.

comments.author: Stepstowealth
comments.body: Quote from: bittraffic on March 07, 2023, 03:02:13 PM$200K is really huge for a giveaway and sure there will be a ton of users trying their luck for it. This is a life changing sum in many countries, and it will attract plenty users trying their luck like you have said. People also like free things, so the thought of them getting free bitcoins is tempting. I am not different and because I like bitcoins so much, have started late to it and looking for a way to get more bitcoins in addition to my strategy of buying small small as I can, this is a really good chance and opportunity for me and other people like me.
